amendment.description: To empower States with programmatic flexibility and predictability to administer a supplemental nutrition assistance block grant program under which, at the request of a State agency, eligible households within the State may receive an adequate, or more nutritious, diet.

action.text: Amendment SA 2392 proposed by Senator Reid to Amendment SA 2391 (the instructions of the motion to recommit).
Motion to table amendment SA 2392 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 65 - 33. Record Vote Number: 120.
